description:
Nuku Nuku is now the most popular girl in class! Her classmates all try to get her to join their clubs. But when she accidentally pushes a big red button and activates a giant haniwa robot, she has to save them a second time... with the help of power armor supplied by the mysterious "Mr. Q".
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nuku Nuku Kodai Iseki! Densetsu no Kyokan Arawaru!
Nuku Nuku vs. the ancient relic! The legendary giant awakens!
ヌクヌク対古代遺跡! 伝説の巨神あらわる!
